name: Keep it on light
description:
Descriptions

You play as a priest, and your job is to guide the lost soul to the sanctuary. Souls will gradually get dissipated without the guidance of the Light, so you need to illuminate their way.

This is a tower defense game, but you don’t need to  fight the enemy and resist their attack. On the contrary, your goal is to help them and try to keep them alive!

This game has 8 well-designed levels , Have fun!

Control

Use mouse to interact.

Left click  the space to build a tower.

Right click the tower to sell it with half price.

Press R to restart the level.

Press ESC to read the tutorial.
